Name: An old man in the sea.
AboutMe:
Since I'm too old to start afresh , and my teenage/young-adulthood rebellious nature prevented me from taking advantage of the education I received, I'm trying to make up for lost time, and have some fun along the way, and so I study mathematics mostly by myself with the vast resources that life gives me, namely the internet. =D

This site is really good. I hope it lasts for many years to come. =)

Also, I'm a bit old school, so I tend to use words/expressions that, to youngsters these days, may sound very strange, like: Please, Thank you, sorry, etc. I've seen that in the web, people tend to be less polite to others, which is a pity.

Be respectful, always. Thanks ;)
